HomePage.title: Cupid Aphrodisiac Chocolate
HomePage.description: Ignite Passion Naturally. Cupid is designed to bring couples closer, enhancing intimacy and connection with every bite.
HomePage.born-from-love: Born from Love, Made for Connection
HomePage.born-from-love-text: Cupid was created to help couples reconnect in today's fast-paced world. Inspired by love and personal experience, our founder Nico, with a background in natural health, developed Cupid's unique blend to reignite intimacy and bring passion back into relationships.

Advantages.heightens-pleasure-text: Amplifies sensual drive and emotional connection
Advantages.natural-safe-text: Loved by couples around the world
Advantages.trusted-text: Vegan, gluten-free, and crafted for everyone
Advantages.fast-text: Enjoy Cupid with no added cost

1.name: Dark Chocolate
1.description: Contains phenylethylamine, known as the "love chemical" which enhances mood and stimulates the release of endorphins. It also increases serotonin levels, promoting relaxation and setting the stage for intimacy

2.name: Black Maca Extract
2.description: Traditionally used as a natural remedy to enhance sexual desire and stamina. Black Maca is rich in nutrients that help balance hormones, improve energy, and boost libido for both men and women.

3.name: L-Arginine
3.description: An amino acid that increases nitric oxide production, dilating blood vessels and improving circulation. It has been used as a treatment to boost sexual activity for women, enhancing sensations, physical response, and overall sexual satisfaction during intimate moments

4.name: Panax Ginseng
4.description: Known as the "King of all herbs," it is used in traditional Chinese medicine to enhance sexual activity. The active ingredient, ginsenoside, has positive effects on libido, erection quality, and sexual arousal. They also help improve sperm quality, enhance sexual performance, and increase overall satisfaction.

5.name: Guarana Extract
5.description: Guarana increases energy, reduces fatigue and supports overall vitality with antioxidants and natural caffeine. It has been shown to improve focus, increase stamina and boost libido, contributing to improved performance and increased intimacy.

6.name: Taurine
6.description: Taurine helps maintain energy levels and focus, reducing stress and supporting muscle function during intimate moments. This creates the ideal balance of relaxation and alertness for a more connected experience.

Subscribe.title: Unlock 10% Off Your Next Order!
Subscribe.description: You can unsubscribe from the newsletter at any time. For more information, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.1: How should I consume Cupid for the best results?
FAQ.1-text: We recommend enjoying Cupid Chocolate with your partner by sharing one piece each (approximately 14.5 g per person). Consume it about 30 minutes before you wish to experience its benefits. This allows the natural ingredients to work effectively during your intimate moments.
FAQ.2: What active ingredients are used in Cupid Chocolate?
FAQ.2-text: Cupid Chocolate is enriched with natural ingredients such as Black Maca, Panax Ginseng, L-Arginine, Guarana Extract, and Taurine. These components are known for their energy-boosting and mood-enhancing properties.
FAQ.3: Can you explain the benefits of these active ingredients?
FAQ.3-text: Black Maca: Traditionally used to enhance libido, energy levels, and hormonal balance. Panax Ginseng: Known for improving sexual arousal and overall performance. L-Arginine: An amino acid that may support healthy blood flow and enhance physical response. Guarana Extract: A natural stimulant that increases energy and reduces fatigue. Taurine: Helps support energy levels and promotes relaxation.
FAQ.4: Is there a recommended daily dose for Cupid Chocolate?
FAQ.4-text: Yes, we advise consuming no more than one piece (approximately 14.5  g) per day. This ensures you receive the optimal amount of active ingredients without exceeding recommended intake levels.
FAQ.5: Is Cupid suitable for both women and men?
FAQ.5-text: Absolutely! Cupid Chocolate is designed to enhance the experience for all adults, regardless of gender. The natural ingredients work to support energy, mood, and intimacy for everyone.
FAQ.6: Who should not consume Cupid Chocolate?
FAQ.6-text: Cupid Chocolate is intended for adults 18 years and older. It is not recommended for children, pregnant or breastfeeding women, or individuals with heart conditions. If you are taking medication, have a medical condition, or have concerns about any of the ingredients, please consult your healthcare provider before use.
FAQ.7-text: When consumed as directed, Cupid Chocolate is generally well-tolerated. However, if you have sensitivities to caffeine or any of the active ingredients, you may experience mild side effects such as restlessness or difficulty sleeping. If you notice any adverse reactions, discontinue use and consult a healthcare professional.
FAQ.8: How long does Cupid Chocolate stay fresh?
FAQ.8-text: Cupid Chocolate has a shelf life of up to 12 months from the production date. The exact expiration date is printed on the back of the packaging. To maintain freshness, store the chocolate in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
FAQ.9: Can I consume Cupid Chocolate if I'm taking medications?
FAQ.9-text: If you are taking medications or have any health concerns, we recommend consulting your healthcare provider before consuming Cupid Chocolate to ensure there are no potential interactions.
FAQ.10: Can I enjoy Cupid Chocolate with alcohol?
FAQ.10-text: While there are no known harmful interactions between Cupid Chocolate and moderate alcohol consumption, combining the two may intensify certain effects. We advise consuming alcohol responsibly and being mindful of how your body responds.
FAQ.11: What should I do if I consume more than the recommended amount?
FAQ.11-text: If you accidentally consume more than the suggested dose, you might experience increased heart rate or restlessness due to the caffeine content. Stay hydrated and avoid consuming additional stimulants. If you feel unwell, please seek medical advice promptly.
FAQ.12: Can I enjoy Cupid Chocolate alone?
FAQ.12-text: Yes, you can certainly enjoy Cupid Chocolate on your own. Whether you're looking to boost your mood, increase energy, or simply indulge in delicious dark chocolate, it's perfect for solo enjoyment as well as sharing with a partner.
FAQ.13-text: Cupid Chocolate is proudly made in Germany, adhering to strict quality standards. Our chocolates are crafted from ethically sourced, high-quality ingredients to ensure the best experience for our customers.
FAQ.14: Is Cupid Chocolate vegan or vegetarian?
FAQ.14-text: Cupid Chocolate is suitable for vegetarians. However, please note that it contains soy and may contain traces of nuts, milk, and gluten due to shared manufacturing equipment. Currently, it is not certified vegan.
FAQ.15-text: Yes, Cupid Chocolate contains soy. It may also contain traces of nuts, milk, and gluten. If you have any food allergies or sensitivities, please review the ingredient list carefully before consuming.
FAQ.16: How should I store Cupid Chocolate?
FAQ.16-text: Store your Cupid Chocolate in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight and strong odors.
FAQ.17: How long do the effects of Cupid Chocolate last?
FAQ.17-text: The effects can vary depending on individual factors such as metabolism and body chemistry. Generally, customers report experiencing benefits for 1 to 3 hours after consumption.
FAQ.18: Do you ship Cupid Chocolate internationally?
FAQ.18-text: Currently, we ship within Germany and to select European countries. Please check our shipping policy or contact customer service for more information on international shipping options.
FAQ.19: Is Cupid Chocolate safe to consume?
FAQ.19-text: Yes, Cupid Chocolate is safe when consumed as directed. It contains no illicit substances or harmful additives. All ingredients are professionally dosed and undergo rigorous quality control.

Footer.description: At Cupid, we believe in the power of shared experiences. Our premium aphrodisiac chocolates are crafted to bring couples closer, igniting passion and creating unforgettable moments. Made with love in Germany, using only the finest natural ingredients to ensure every bite is a delight.

SexChocolate.title-1: How Many Boxes Would You Like?
SexChocolate.finest-ingredients-text: Made with premium ingredients in Germany.
SexChocolate.discreet-packaging-text: Delivered in unmarked packages for your privacy.
SexChocolate.delicious-flavor-text: Rich taste that enhances your experience.

BenefitsDrawerContent.ignite-passion-and-performance-text: Elevate your intimate moments with our exclusive blend of six clinically-studied natural ingredients. This potent formula boosts libido, enhances pleasure, increases energy, and uplifts mood to support a more satisfying and connected experience.
BenefitsDrawerContent.boost-libido-and-desire-text: Experience a heightened sense of desire with natural aphrodisiacs like Black Maca and Panax Ginseng. These ingredients have been traditionally used to stimulate sexual desire and improve performance, helping you rekindle passion and excitement in your relationship.
BenefitsDrawerContent.improve-blood-flow-and-sensation-text: Enhance your physical response with L-Arginine, an amino acid that supports healthy blood flow. By promoting better circulation, it can intensify sensations and contribute to more fulfilling intimate experiences.
BenefitsDrawerContent.increase-energy-and-stamina-text: Stay energized and combat fatigue with Guarana Extract and Taurine. These natural energizers help increase stamina and endurance, allowing you to enjoy longer-lasting moments without feeling drained.
BenefitsDrawerContent.enhance-mood-and-connection-text: Lift your spirits and deepen your emotional connection with Dark Chocolate, rich in mood-enhancing compounds like phenylethylamine, known as the "love chemical." This ingredient helps promote relaxation and a positive mood, setting the stage for intimacy.
BenefitsDrawerContent.support-hormonal-balance-text: Maintain a healthy hormonal balance with Black Maca, which supports overall sexual health for both men and women. By naturally balancing hormones, it aids in improving libido and sexual function.
BenefitsDrawerContent.promote-overall-well-being-text: Our holistic formula not only focuses on enhancing intimate moments but also contributes to your general wellness. The combination of natural ingredients works synergistically to support your vitality and well-being.

NutritionalDrawerContent.suggested-use-text: For a shared experience, divide one Cupid chocolate piece (half per person) and enjoy it together with your partner 30 minutes before your special moment.
NutritionalDrawerContent.suggested-use-text-2: Maximum recommended daily intake: 1/2 piece per person (approx. 15g)
NutritionalDrawerContent.ingredients-text: Cocoa mass, sugar, cocoa butter, popping candy, aphrodisiac blend (Schwarze Maca-Extrakt (20:1), L-Arginin, Guarana-Extrakt (6:1), Panax Ginseng-Extrakt (35:1), Taurin), contains caffeine from guarana, emulsifier: SOYA LECITHIN, vanilla extract, natural flavoring.
NutritionalDrawerContent.warning-text: The use of this product is not suitable for children, pregnant women, nursing mothers, and people who have suffered a heart attack. The following individuals should consult their doctor or pharmacist before using this product:
NutritionalDrawerContent.warning-item-3: People with kidney or liver diseases
NutritionalDrawerContent.warning-text-2: Recommended daily dose of L-Arginine: max. 3.0g. One portion (15g) contains 0.44g of L-Arginine.
NutritionalDrawerContent.may-contain-traces: May contain traces of milk, hazelnuts, and almonds.
